actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title 4 of the United States Code to prohibit a State from imposing a discriminatory tax on income earned within such State by nonresidents of such State.
short_title: Nonresident Income Tax Freedom Act of 2001

summary.text: Nonresident Income Tax Freedom Act of 2001 - Amends Federal law to prohibit, except as provided for by State compact, a State or subdivision from taxing income earned in such State by nonresidents.

titles.title: Nonresident Income Tax Freedom Act of 2001
A bill to amend title 4 of the United States Code to prohibit a State from imposing a discriminatory tax on income earned within such State by nonresidents of such State.
